Package org.gstreamer.event

Interface Summary
BusSyncHandler  
 

Class Summary
BufferSizeEvent Notification of new latency adjustment.
EOSEvent End-Of-Stream.
FlushStartEvent Start a flush operation.
FlushStopEvent Stop a flush operation.
LatencyEvent Notification of new latency adjustment.
NavigationEvent Navigation events are usually used for communicating user requests, such as mouse or keyboard movements, to upstream elements.
NewSegmentEvent The newsegment event marks the range of buffers to be processed.
QOSEvent A quality message.
SeekEvent A request for a new playback position and rate.
StepEvent StepEvent.
TagEvent A new set of metadata tags has been found in the stream.
